languages.text: "Хотя я начала менять мнение о вас еще раньше — когда вы согласились поговорить с сиротами по моей просьбе. Лидер, который готов воздать почести тем, кто сложил за него голову, и позаботится об их детях, не может не внушать доверия. И то, как вы держали себя тогда..."

traits.locale_text: "Хотя я начала менять мнение о вас еще раньше — когда вы согласились поговорить с сиротами по моей просьбе. Лидер, который готов воздать почести тем, кто сложил за него голову, и позаботится об их детях, не может не внушать доверия. И то, как вы держали себя тогда..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."
languages.original_text: "Хотя я начала менять мнение о вас еще раньше — когда вы согласились поговорить с сиротами по моей просьбе. Лидер, который готов воздать почести тем, кто сложил за него голову, и позаботится об их детях, не может не внушать доверия. И то, как вы держали себя тогда..."

traits.locale_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honor those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you carried yourself back then..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honor those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you carried yourself back then..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “不过，早在那之前，早在你接受我的请求，愿意与那些孤儿们谈谈的时候，我对你的看法就已经开始改变了。你愿意尊重那些为了你而牺牲的人们，愿意照顾那些人的孩子，这才是值得信任的领袖。还有，你在那时做出了选择……”
languages.original_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

traits.locale_text: “不过，早在那之前，早在你接受我的请求，愿意与那些孤儿们谈谈的时候，我对你的看法就已经开始改变了。你愿意尊重那些为了你而牺牲的人们，愿意照顾那些人的孩子，这才是值得信任的领袖。还有，你在那时做出了选择……”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Aunque mi opinión sobre usted ya había empezado a cambiar antes de eso. Fue cuando aceptó mi petición de que hablara con los huérfanos. Un{mf||a} líder que está dispuest{mf|o|a} a honrar a quienes han dado sus vidas por {mf|él|ella} y cuidar de sus hijos es un{mf||a} líder que inspira confianza. Su comportamiento en ese momento...».
languages.original_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

traits.locale_text: «Aunque mi opinión sobre usted ya había empezado a cambiar antes de eso. Fue cuando aceptó mi petición de que hablara con los huérfanos. Un{mf||a} líder que está dispuest{mf|o|a} a honrar a quienes han dado sus vidas por {mf|él|ella} y cuidar de sus hijos es un{mf||a} líder que inspira confianza. Su comportamiento en ese momento...».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「我が陛下に対する意見を変えようと思い始めたのは…我の求めに応じて孤児たちと話すことに同意されたときです。自分のために命を捨ててくれた人々に敬意を払い、子供たちの面倒を見ることを厭わない指導者は信頼を抱くに値する。そして、あの時の陛下の行動は…」
languages.original_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

traits.locale_text: 「我が陛下に対する意見を変えようと思い始めたのは…我の求めに応じて孤児たちと話すことに同意されたときです。自分のために命を捨ててくれた人々に敬意を払い、子供たちの面倒を見ることを厭わない指導者は信頼を抱くに値する。そして、あの時の陛下の行動は…」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Meinung von Euch hatte sich allerdings schon vorher ein wenig gewandelt – als Ihr meiner Bitte entspracht, mit den Waisen zu reden. Wenn Anführer jene ehren, die ihr Leben für sie gegeben haben, und sich um deren Kinder kümmern, weckt das Vertrauen. Und Euer Verhalten in diesem Moment ..."
languages.original_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Meinung von Euch hatte sich allerdings schon vorher ein wenig gewandelt – als Ihr meiner Bitte entspracht, mit den Waisen zu reden. Wenn Anführer jene ehren, die ihr Leben für sie gegeben haben, und sich um deren Kinder kümmern, weckt das Vertrauen. Und Euer Verhalten in diesem Moment ..."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « À vrai dire, mon opinion de vous avait commencé à changer avant cela, lorsque vous avez accepté de rencontrer les orphelins à ma demande. {mf|Un|Une} chef qui honore ceux qui ont donné leur vie pour {mf|lui|elle} et veille sur leurs enfants, c'est {mf|un|une} chef qui inspire confiance. Et votre attitude lors de l'audience... »
languages.original_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

traits.locale_text: « À vrai dire, mon opinion de vous avait commencé à changer avant cela, lorsque vous avez accepté de rencontrer les orphelins à ma demande. {mf|Un|Une} chef qui honore ceux qui ont donné leur vie pour {mf|lui|elle} et veille sur leurs enfants, c'est {mf|un|une} chef qui inspire confiance. Et votre attitude lors de l'audience... »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ancak seninle ilgili görüşlerim, bu olaydan çok daha önce şekillenmeye başladı. Ricamı kırmayıp öksüzlerle görüşmeyi kabul ettiğinde yani... Soylu bir amaç uğruna hayatını kaybedenleri onurlandırmaktan gocunmayan bir lidersin. O kahramanların çocuklarına sahip çıkıp himayendekilere güven aşıladın. O anki davranışların..."
languages.original_text: "Although my opinion of you started to change even before then — back when you agreed to talk to the orphans at my request. A leader who's willing to honour those who laid down their lives for them, and take care of their children, is a leader who inspires trust. And the way you acted in that moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak seninle ilgili görüşlerim, bu olaydan çok daha önce şekillenmeye başladı. Ricamı kırmayıp öksüzlerle görüşmeyi kabul ettiğinde… Soylu bir amaç uğruna hayatını kaybedenleri onurlandırmaktan gocunmayan bir lidersin. O kahramanların çocuklarına sahip çıktın ve himayendekilere güven aşıladın. O anki davranışların…"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
